Description: This week, we put a wrap on college football season with Steve Ehrhart, Executive Director of the Liberty Bowl. Ehrhart talks about the opportunity bowls provide for teams, sponsorship and the future of the college football playoff.<br /><hr><p style='color:grey; font-size:0.75em;'> See <a style='color:grey;' target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer' href='https://acast.com/privacy'>acast.com/privacy</a> for privacy and opt-out information.</p>
